name: GUARANTOR_SCANNED_DOCS
description: Information about documents that have been scanned for this guarantor account.

columns.name: ACCT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the account record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: SCAN_FILE_NAME
columns.description: The name of the scan file for this guarantor's document.

columns.name: SCAN_DOC_TYPE_C_NAME
columns.description: The document type category ID for the guarantor's scanned document.

columns.name: SCAN_DOC_DESC
columns.description: A description of the guarantor's scanned document.

columns.name: SCAN_DEPARTMENT_ID
columns.description: The unique ID of the department for this guarantor's scanned document.

columns.name: DOC_SCAN_DATE
columns.description: The date when the guarantor's document was scanned.
